issue.title: [CF 631] 5.0.5 Error during Raids
issue.body:
I'm always using last alpha... and i'm getting a spam of this error :

73x [ADDON_ACTION_BLOCKED] AddOn "TellMeWhen" tried to call the protected function "OverrideActionBarButton3:Show()".
!BugGrabber-r188\BugGrabber.lua:587: in function <!BugGrabber\BugGrabber.lua:587>
<in C code>
FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:268: in function "ActionButton_Update"
FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:505: in function "ActionButton_OnEvent"
FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:124: in function <FrameXML\ActionButton.lua:117>

Locals:
nil

I sincerely can't understand which can be the problem... and dunno how to help you ... it seems something related with TMW interacting with ActionButton Blizzard addon?


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #631 | Raw

comments.body:
Just Blizzard's crappy taint catcher picking a random addon to blame for this. TellMeWhen isn't actually doing anything.

I get the same error with a countless number of other addons. You should hopefully notice that nothing in your UI is actually broken as a result of this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

<<reply 960938>>

Oh ... Great Blizzard :D
That's why everything is fully workin... do you know if they plan to fix it? I'm bored by bugsack growing :D


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77

Not likely. These happened all the way through Cata for me, so the chances are very slim that it will ever get fixed.

Just like the taint issue when removing a glyph - Blizzard's taint catcher picks a random addon to blame, so as far as they are concerned, it is that addon is tainting the UI or otherwise doing things that it shouldn't be doing, even though it isn't. Its either that, or they are completely oblivious that the real problem is actually in their own UI code and not in the code of addons.

TL;DR - unlikely that Blizzard will ever fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
